title: Milk: from farm to you. - 3rd ed.
creator_credit: James Kennedy, Thomas Smith and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Follows the complete cycle of milk production, including the necessity of conception and calving. Explains homogenisation and pasteurisation, and depicts the production of related dairy products such as cheese and icecream. Suitable for secondary level.
